data.name: Miracle Snack Shop / Philia After Story
data.detailed_description:
–Find out what happens to Philia and our main character as they begin their new lives!

–Two to three hours of playtime (120 days to unlock your ending)

–New character art and outfits for Philia!

–Fully voiced in Korean

–Listen to Philia's new song (Singer - Hyewon Jung) / https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iJvdcAe360Q
data.about_the_game:
–Find out what happens to Philia and our main character as they begin their new lives!

–Two to three hours of playtime (120 days to unlock your ending)

–New character art and outfits for Philia!

–Fully voiced in Korean

–Listen to Philia's new song (Singer - Hyewon Jung) / https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iJvdcAe360Q
data.short_description: Find out what happens to Philia and our main character as they begin their new lives!
data.supported_languages:
Korean*, English, Japanese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® XP or higher
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 3 or higher
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 32MB or greater graphics card
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® XP or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or higher
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 64MB or greater graphics card
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound
